verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:42
verses.text: That the slayer might flee thither, which should kill his neighbour unawares, and hated him not in times past; and that fleeing unto one of these cities he might live:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:43
verses.text: Namely, Bezer in the wilderness, in the plain country, of the Reubenites; and Ramoth in Gilead, of the Gadites; and Golan in Bashan, of the Manassites.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:44
verses.text: And this is the law which Moses set before the children of Israel:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:45
verses.text: These are the testimonies, and the statutes, and the judgments, which Moses spake unto the children of Israel, after they came forth out of Egypt,
